options.name: Fledgling Marksman
options.description: You have trained with several types of ranged weapons. Gain +1 skill with simple and complex ranged weapons.

options.name: Action : Pin Down
options.description: You make an attack with a ranged weapon against a large or smaller creature with legs, reducing their movement speed by 2. Your attack must deal damage for this effect to work.

options.name: Action : Headshot
options.description: While making an attack with a simple or complex ranged weapon roll 1 less dice. Your first dice deals double damage if it hits, or triple if it is also a critical hit.

options.name: Improved Aim
options.description: Your aiming is greatly improved, increasing your optimal range on simple and complex ranged weapons by 1.

options.name: Fletching
options.description: You are skilled at making your own ammunition. Gain +1 skill with engineering. When crafting ammunition or ranged weapons, roll an additional dice.

options.name: Focused
options.description: Marksman require a centered mind to achieve their potential. Gain +1 skill with concentration and coordination.

options.name: Skilled Marksman
options.description: You have trained with several types of ranged weapons. Gain +1 skill with simple and complex ranged weapons.

options.name: Perfectly Precise
options.description: You can use an action to shoot an inanimate object without rolling a check, as long as it is within your optimal range. Additionally, you ignore partial cover when making attacks with ranged weapons.

options.name: Action : Marksman Stance
options.description: You enter a stance that allows you to utilize your concentration to improve your aim, granting you a bonus dice to all ranged and throwing attacks. This stance ends if your concentration is lost.

options.name: Talented Marksman
options.description: Your relentless training has resulted in +1 talent with simple and complex ranged weapons.
